name: Gunpowder
details: Saltpitre with sulphur and charcoal - 2X trit. "Blood-poisoning." Septic suppuration. Protractive against wound infection. Antidote to Ivy and Primula rash Clarke. HERPES FACIALIS; crops of boils. Carbuncles. Osteomyelitis. Abscesses, boils, carbuncles, limb purple. Wounds that refuse to heal; accident from bad food or water.
